title: SharePoint / OneDrive
description: Connect to SharePoint Online document libraries, OneDrive for Business, or OneDrive Personal. Supports Microsoft 365 work/school accounts and personal Microsoft accounts.

connectorName.title: Name of the connector
connectorName.description: A friendly name to identify this connector

is_personal.title: Personal Account
is_personal.description: Enable for OneDrive Personal (consumer Microsoft accounts). Leave disabled for SharePoint or OneDrive for Business (work/school accounts).

site_url.title: Site URL
site_url.description: SharePoint site URL (e.g., https://contoso.sharepoint.com/sites/mysite). Leave empty for OneDrive Personal or OneDrive for Business root.

tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: Azure AD Tenant ID (Directory ID). Required for SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. Leave empty for Personal accounts.

client_id.title: Client ID (Application ID)
client_id.description: The Application (client) ID from your Azure AD or Microsoft app registration

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Client secret from your app registration. Required for app-only (client credentials) authentication.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: OAuth access token. Use this for user-delegated access when client_secret is not provided.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: OAuth refresh token for automatic token renewal.

drive_id.title: Drive ID (Optional)
drive_id.description: Specific Drive/Document Library ID. Leave empty to use the default drive.
